channel.title: Ns on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Ns on OSLC - Open Services for Lifecycle Collaboration

item.description: Canonical sources AM: XML Asset: XML Automation: XML LDBP: XML CM: Turtle Config: Turtle Core: Turtle EMS: XML Perfmon: XML QM: XML RM: Turtle TRS: Turtle Converting RDF files Make sure Jena is installed and its bin dir is on your PATH. You will need Java11 (SDKMan) get Apache jena command line utilities Download from Apache Jena Releases to say ~/lib/ export JENA_HOME=~/lib/jena-4.6.1/apache-jena export PATH=$PATH:$JENA_HOME/bin Make sure JAVA_HOME is set properly Or use brew install jena Go into a folder in the NS.
